ModInfo.description:
Exposes game state data via TCP and HTTP APIs, enabling companion apps, overlays, and external tools to read live game information.
[h1]Connection Options[/h1] [list] [*] [b]TCP (port 9876)[/b]: Persistent connection that receives push notifications on game events [*] [b]HTTP (port 9877)[/b]: REST API for on-demand queries (GET /state, /players, /cities, /characters, /character-events, /tribes) [/list]
[h1]Data Exposed[/h1] [list] [*] [b]Players[/b]: Nation, stockpiles, yield rates, legitimacy, city/unit counts [*] [b]Cities[/b]: Yields, improvements, build queues, religion, culture, happiness, governor, family [*] [b]Characters[/b]: 75+ fields including traits, ratings, jobs, spouses, children, opinions, relationships [*] [b]Character Events[/b]: Births, deaths, marriages, leader changes, heir changes [*] [b]Diplomacy[/b]: Team relationships, war states, war scores, alliances [*] [b]Tribes[/b]: Strength, cities, settlements, diplomacy with players [/list]
[h1]Documentation[/h1] [url=https://becked.github.io/OldWorldAPIEndpoint]API Documentation[/url]
[h1]Source Code[/h1] [url=https://github.com/becked/OldWorldAPIEndpoint]GitHub Repository[/url]
